title: 즉흥적 의견 - 직관적 판단
description: 순간적이고 직관적인 판단을 자연스럽게 표현하는 원어민 수준의 의견 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: My gut feeling says this is the right way to go.
First impression? I'm not really feeling it.
Something feels off. I don't have a good feeling about this.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 직관적 판단 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 직감적으로 보면, 이게 맞는 것 같아.
sentences.en: My gut feeling says this is the right way to go.
First impression? I'm not really feeling it.
Something feels off. I don't have a good feeling about this.
It hits me right away. This is it!

sentences.kr: 어떻게 설명할 순 없지만, 뭔가 아니야.
sentences.en: I can't explain it, but something's not right.
I instantly thought this was good.
I can sense it intuitively. This is going to work.
I don't know why, but I'm not convinced.
